Title: Provides that the list of pre-authoized procedures is to be used only as a list of treatment that does not require insurance carrier approval
Summary: Simplifies the procedure by which injured workers obtain treatment for injuries covered by the workers' compensation law; provides that the list of pre-authorized procedures is to be used only as a list of treatment that does not require insurance carrier approval.
LawCode: Amd ยง13-a, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to simplifying the procedure by which injured workers obtain treatment for injuries covered by the workers' compensation law
